title: 876. Matthew 18:20; John 4:23, 24
verses:
"Where two or three meet in	my name,
I shall be there with them."

"The hour will come—
in fact it is here already—
when true worshippers will worship
the Father in spirit and truth:

"that is the kind of worshipper
the Father wants.
God is spirit, and those who worship
must worship in spirit and truth."
